plugin.description: Insert and update Table of Contents in notes
plugin.author: jgclark

plugin.commands.name: insert TOC
plugin.commands.description: Insert a Table of Contents at the top of the current note

plugin.commands.name: Table of Contents: Update Plugin Settings

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.title: Write TOC under heading
plugin.settings.description: The heading to write the TOC under. If empty, the TOC will be written at the top of the note. WARNING: will replace any text from TOC header down to the next ## or ### header.

plugin.settings.title: Include a blank H1 under the TOC header
plugin.settings.description: If true, a blank H1 will be inserted under the TOC header.

plugin.settings.title: Pad text with spaces
plugin.settings.description: If true, the text will be padded with spaces.

plugin.settings.title: Use horizontal mode
plugin.settings.description: If true, the TOC will be displayed in a single-line (horizontal) format.

plugin.settings.title: Bullet
plugin.settings.description: The bullet to use for the TOC. (Note: indents and bullet only apply when in vertical output mode (horizontal: false).)

plugin.settings.title: Indent text
plugin.settings.description: If true, the text will be indented. (Note: indents and bullet only apply when in vertical output mode (horizontal: false).)

plugin.settings.title: Convert text to uppercase
plugin.settings.description: If true, the text will be converted to uppercase.

plugin.settings.title: Highlight text
plugin.settings.description: If true, the text will be highlighted.

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Table of Contents commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
